create-loan.title: Loan
create-loan.subtitle: Allows to create loans for books
create-loan.info-no-existing-loans-body: No existing loans were found, a new one can be created.
create-loan.error-existing-loans-body: Existing loan was found, a new one cannot be created!

return-book.title: Return
return-book.subtitle: Allows to return books
return-book.info-existing-loans-body: Existing loan was found, it can be returned!

renew-loan.title: Renew
renew-loan.subtitle: Allows to renew loans
renew-loan.info-renew-loan-success-body: The renewal of the loan was successful.
renew-loan.error-renew-loan-date-in-past: End time may not be in the past!

location-identifier.headline: Identifier for book placement
location-identifier.placeholder: Please enter the identifier to place the book

error-permission-message: You need to be a library officer to use this function!
error-login-message: You need to be logged in to use this function!
title: Library shelving
subtitle: Allows the shelving of books in the library
